law.text: Appeals from the orders of each urban-county administrator may be taken to the board by filing with the board within thirty (30) days a certified copy of the orders of the urban-county administrator. Matters at issue shall be heard by the board as upon an original proceeding. Appeals from orders of the urban-county administrator shall be governed by KRS Chapter 13B.
law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 435, sec. 3, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 522, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 194, sec. 5, effective June 17, 1978.
